entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
